title: Easy access to public transportation, Elevator access, Renovated unit
posting_body: ['1 BD | 1 BA | 740 SQFT', "Embrace classic comfort and contemporary style at 3300 Tamarac Apartments, in Denver's Hampden neighborhood.", 'Our collection of refined studio, 1 & 2 bedroom apartments offer you a place to rest, relax, and have a little fun.', 'From our relaxed modern style and upscale social spaces to chic interiors, youll be ready to unwind in no time.', 'Apartment Features:', 'Private balcony or patio Featured amenity', '-Separate dining area', '-Energy efficient appliances including built-in microwave, refrigerator, and dishwasher select units Featured amenity', '-Fireplaces available', '-Oversized closets', '-Wood-style plank flooring in kitchen and living areas', '-Elevator access', '-Renovated unit', '-9-foot ceilings', '-Ceiling fans in living areas and bedrooms', 'Community Features:', 'Fitness center with free weights and cardio machines Featured amenity', '-Reserved covered parking Photo Featured amenity', '-Pet friendly (breed restrictions apply)', '-Indoor racquetball courts', '-Resident social lounge with demonstration kitchen and billiards table', '-Onsite playground', '-Easy access to public transportation', '-Virtual Moving Concierge: Complimentary address change, set up home services and digital moving announcements', '-Fenced dog park with pet watering station', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'For more information, visit us at: <URL>', 'Equal Housing Opportunity', 'Prices Change Daily', 'Flexible Lease Terms']
